text: <prosody rate="-20%" pitch="-0%"><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="ɪθɪ">iti</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɪdɪθvɑh">viditvā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="nɪɺupɐdʰɪ">nirupadhi</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="0.001s"/><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="upɐdʰɪsɐṅkʰɐje">upadhisaṅkhaye</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɪmuθθo">vimutto</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="0.001s"/><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="upɐdʰɪsmɪṃ">upadhismiṃ</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɑh">vā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="kɑjɐṃ">kāyaṃ</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="0.001s"/><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="upɐsɐṃhɐɺɪssɐθɪ">upasaṃharissati</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="cɪθθɐṃ">cittaṃ</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɑh">vā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="0.001s"/><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="uppɑdessɐθiːθɪ">uppādessatīti</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> — <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="neθɐṃ">netaṃ</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="ṭhɑnɐṃ">ṭhānaṃ</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɪʝ.ʝɐθɪ">vijjati</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/>.</prosody>
